forceMST_tria3.c

Go to the documentation of this file.
00001 /******************************************************************************
00002 * File      : forceMST_tria3.c                                                *
00003 * Author    : Carlos Rosales Fernandez (carlos@ihpc.a-star.edu.sg)            *
00004 * Date      : 01-09-2006                                                      *
00005 * Revision  : 1.0                                                             *
00006 *******************************************************************************
00007 * DESCRIPTION                                                                 *
00008 * Calculates the DEP force at dielectric interfaces using the Maxwell Stress  *
00009 * Tensor method. Returns the total force and the application point in arrays  *
00010 * F[] and Xcm[].                                                              *
00011 * Works for linear interpolation in triangular elements (3-noded triangles).  *
00012 * F[0]   = Fx   |    F[1]   = Fy   |    F[2]   = Fz                           *
00013 * Xcm[0] = x    |    Xcm[1] = y    |    Xcm[2] = z                            *
00014 ******************************************************************************/
00015 
00016 /******************************************************************************
00017 * COPYRIGHT & LICENSE INFORMATION                                             *
00018 *                                                                             *
00019 * Copyright 2006 Carlos Rosales Fernandez and The Institute of High           *
00020 * Performance Computing (A*STAR)                                              *
00021 *                                                                             *
00022 * This file is part of depSolver.                                             *
00023 *                                                                             *
00024 * depSolver is free software; you can redistribute it and/or modify           *
00025 * it under the terms of the GNU General Public License as published by        *
00026 * the Free Software Foundation; either version 2 of the License, or           *
00027 * (at your option) any later version.                                         *
00028 *                                                                             *
00029 * depSolver is distributed in the hope that it will be useful,                *
00030 * but WITHOUT ANY WARRANTY; without even the implied warranty of              *
00031 * MERCHANTABILITY or FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE.  See the               *
00032 * GNU General Public License for more details.                                *
00033 *                                                                             *
00034 * You should have received a copy of the GNU General Public License           *
00035 * along with depSolver; if not, write to the Free Software                    *
00036 * Foundation, Inc., 51 Franklin St, Fifth Floor, Boston, MA  02110-1301  USA  *
00037 ******************************************************************************/
00038 
00039 #include "forceMST_tria3.h"
00040 
00041 int forceMST_tria3(double **mNodes, unsigned int **mElems, 
00042                    unsigned int *vBCType, double *vB, double Eps, 
00043                    double **Fce, double **Xce, double *Fcm, double *Xcm)
00044 {
00045     const unsigned int ELEMS = nElems, NODES = nNodes, NODES_IN_ELEM = 3;
00046     unsigned int currentNode, i, j, N;
00047     double A, J;
00048     double L[2], M[3], mF[3], mE[6], Xin[3];
00049     double X[3][3], E[3][3];
00050     double **Efield;
00051 
00052     /* Memory allocation for real part of electric field */
00053     Efield = doubleMatrix(NODES,3,1);
00054 
00055     /* Initialize */
00056     A = 0.5*Eps;
00057     L[0] = 0.25;
00058     L[1] = 0.25;
00059     N = 0;
00060     Xcm[0] = Xcm[1] = Xcm[2] = 0.0;
00061     Fcm[0] = Fcm[1] = Fcm[2] = 0.0;
00062 
00063     /* Electric field values in the surface nodes */
00064     for(i = 0; i < NODES; i++){
00065         if(vBCType[i] == 6){
00066             Xin[0] = mNodes[i][0];
00067             Xin[1] = mNodes[i][1];
00068             Xin[2] = mNodes[i][2];
00069             
00070             Xcm[0] += Xin[0];
00071             Xcm[1] += Xin[1];
00072             Xcm[2] += Xin[2];
00073             N++;
00074 
00075             field_tria3(Xin,mNodes,mElems,vB,mE);
00076 
00077             /* Save Re(E) for later use */
00078             Efield[i][0] = mE[0];
00079             Efield[i][1] = mE[2];
00080             Efield[i][2] = mE[4];
00081         }
00082     }
00083     Xcm[0] = Xcm[0]/N;
00084     Xcm[1] = Xcm[1]/N;
00085     Xcm[2] = Xcm[2]/N;
00086 
00087     /* Integrate the Maxwell's Stress Tensor over the surface of the particle */
00088     for(i = 0; i < ELEMS; i++){
00089         if(vBCType[mElems[i][0]-1] == 6){
00090             for(j = 0; j < NODES_IN_ELEM; j++){
00091                 currentNode = mElems[i][j] - 1;
00092                 X[j][0] = mNodes[currentNode][0];
00093                 X[j][1] = mNodes[currentNode][1];
00094                 X[j][2] = mNodes[currentNode][2];
00095                 E[j][0] = Efield[currentNode][0];
00096                 E[j][1] = Efield[currentNode][1];
00097                 E[j][2] = Efield[currentNode][2];
00098             }
00099         
00100             /* Contribution from this element */
00101             intF_tria3(X,E,mF);
00102 
00103             /* Element centre */
00104             shape_tria3(L,M);
00105             J = X2L_tria3(X,Xin,L,M);
00106 
00107             Fce[i][0] = A*mF[0];
00108             Fce[i][1] = A*mF[1];
00109             Fce[i][2] = A*mF[2];
00110             Xce[i][0] = Xin[0];
00111             Xce[i][1] = Xin[1];
00112             Xce[i][2] = Xin[2];
00113         
00114             /* Add contribution to the total force at the centre of mass */
00115             Fcm[0] += Fce[i][0];
00116             Fcm[1] += Fce[i][1];
00117             Fcm[2] += Fce[i][2];
00118         }
00119     }
00120 
00121     freeDoubleMatrix(Efield,NODES);
00122 
00123     return 0;
00124 }
